Performance:
September 1976 Kōkōsei no tame no Bunraku Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

Production: September 1976 Kōkōsei no tame no Bunraku Kyōshitsu

Play: The Amorous Courier (傾城恋飛脚)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:
